results.title: Deluxe Room
results.inroomamenitiesleft:
For Your Comfort
  • A choice of king-sized or twin beds
  • Pillow menu
  • Ensuite bathroom
  • Hairdryer

For Your Convenience
  • Complimentary wired and wireless high-speed Internet access
  • Personal digital safe
  • Personalised wake-up service
  • 24-hour in-room dining
  • Daily turn-down service upon request
results.inroomamenitiesright:
For Your Indulgence
  • LCD television with local and cable channels
  • In-room movies
  • Fully-stocked minibar
  • Coffee and tea making facilities
  • Daily newspaper upon request
results.description: Refresh in these spacious rooms and unwind on the plush cushion top beds.
